meanings.sent1: The old building was bombable, so the army decided to target it.
meanings.sent2: The military identified the bombable areas in the city and planned their attack.
meanings.sent3: The bombable target turned out to be a decoy, much to the surprise of the soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The bombable location was like a magnet for enemy aircraft, drawing them in effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bombable structure stood out in the landscape, inviting destruction.

meanings.sent1: The open field was bombable, making it a perfect practice area for the air force.
meanings.sent2: The bombable runway was crucial for the success of the mission.
meanings.sent3: The bombable target was so obvious, even the trainees could spot it from afar.
meanings.sent4: The bombable site resembled a bullseye, attracting the attention of the bombers.
meanings.sent5: The bombable terrain provided the ideal conditions for the military exercise.
